content.raw: I made some fixes to the Xenial build in [186a730](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/186a730ba3938253df6188eadbf1641f8618d0ea) . The compilation of ign\_sensors master branch is currently failing: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/13/consoleFull#console-section-14](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/13/consoleFull#console-section-14)
